languages.text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} применяет {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Выверенную атаку{/g} против цели, на которую наложено {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} или более {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимостей{/g}, то успешное {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the Adept uses Precise Attack on a target affected by 10-(INT bonus) or more clues and hits, that hit becomes a critical hit.
If the Adept uses Precise Attack on a target affected by (10 − INT bonus) or more exploits and scores a hit, that hit becomes a critical hit.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses Precise Attack on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

If the Adept uses Precise {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more exploits and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses Precise Attack on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} применяет {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Выверенную атаку{/g} против цели, на которую наложено {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} или более {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимостей{/g}, то успешное {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} применяет {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Выверенную атаку{/g} против цели, на которую наложено {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} или более {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимостей{/g}, то успешное {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если адепт применяет Выверенную атаку против цели, на которую наложено (10 − бонус ИНТ) или более уязвимостей, то успешное попадание становится критическим.

Если адепт применяет Выверенную атаку против цели, на которую наложено {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} или более уязвимостей, то успешное {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

languages.text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}{g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}精准攻击{/g}的目标至少拥有{uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488}层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，且此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人，则此次攻击必然会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果技师精准{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}的目标受到“研究”效果影响，层数不小于（10-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}），且此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人，则此次攻击必然会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。

如果技师精准{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}的目标受到“研究”效果影响，层数不小于{uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488}，且此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人，则此次攻击必然会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} usa {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Ataque preciso{/g} contra un objetivo afectado por {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} o más {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, el impacto pasa a ser un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el agente usa Ataque preciso contra un objetivo afectado por {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} o más {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, el impacto pasa a ser un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

Si el adepto usa {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Ataque{/g} preciso contra un objetivo afectado por {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} o más vulnerabilidades e {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g}, el impacto pasa a ser un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488}以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}の効果を受けているターゲットに対して精密攻撃を行い{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、その攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses Precise Attack on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488}以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}の効果を受けているターゲットに対して精密攻撃を行い{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、その攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。

アデプトが{uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488}以上のエクスプロイトが適用されているターゲットに対して精密{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}を行い{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}すると、その攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} ein Ziel unter dem Einfluss von {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} mit einem {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Präzisionsangriff{/g} attackiert und dabei einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} landet, wird daraus ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Agent einen Präzisionsangriff auf ein Ziel anwendet, das unter dem Einfluss von {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} steht, und dabei einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} landet, wird daraus ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.

Wenn der Adept einen {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Präzisionsangriff{/g} auf ein Ziel anwendet, das unter dem Einfluss von {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} oder mehr Ausnutzen steht, und dabei einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} landet, wird daraus ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.

languages.text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} utilise {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Attaque précise{/g} sur une cible qui est sous l'effet d'au moins {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} et qu'il inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}, ce coup se transforme en {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} veya daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüye{/g} maruz kalmış bir hedefin üzerinde {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Keskin Saldırı{/g} kullanıp {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} gerçekleştirirse o vuruş, {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
